name: Yeti Game
description:
Yeti Game is a fun, fast paced action game. Help to escape snow man from the high mountains. Help snow man to slide along a rope over the water and jump on the ice. don’t let him to fall and help him to survive!
The way to play is very easy:
Control white Yeti with just single tap, push finger at any place on screen to start glide with zip line trolley release finger from screen to let Yeti jump on iceberg and land safety.
On the main screen you have 2 digits blue ones are your game Score (successfully passed icebergs) and the Red ones is current slide speed on rope. Pay attention that slide speed always varies, so "be careful" and before launch always check the red numbers.

The game "Yeti Game" is so easy, but super fun.
Challenge your friends or other gamers in pursuit of high scores, compare your best score to other players online.

Features:
Absolutely gorgeous snow landscapes, clear and simple pictures with winter spirit. Relaxing terrains with parallax effect. Mountains, rocks, sea, hills, and of course a lot of snow and ice everywhere.

Let’s feel like a mountain climber, the fun will never end!

******************************
If you're having any problems with this app, feel free to contact me at helpnsg@gmail.com. Tell me about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using. I will try to help you as soon as possible.
